name: splitView(_:shouldCollapseSubview:forDoubleClickOnDividerAt:)
desc: Allows a delegate to determine if a subview collapses in response to a double click.
declaration:
optional func splitView(_ splitView: NSSplitView, 
  shouldCollapseSubview subview: NSView, 
forDoubleClickOnDividerAt dividerIndex: Int) -> Bool
